FZAK52 PAFG 151129
CWFWCZ

Coastal Waters Forecast for Northwest Alaska
National Weather Service Fairbanks AK
329 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023

Northwestern Alaska Coastal Waters out 100 NM

Wind forecasts reflect the predominant speed and direction
expected. Sea forecasts represent the average of the highest one-
third of the combined wind-wave and swell height.

PKZ299-160215-
329 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.SYNOPSIS FOR NORTHWEST COAST...
A cold front stretching from Point Hope to the Bering Strait to 
Nunivak Island will weaken in place today. Weak high pressure will
build north across the central Bering Friday.

$$
